name: CNF-SAT
description: Does a boolean formula in conjunctive normal form have a satisfying assignment?

name: Independent Set
description: Is there a subset of size at least k of vertices of an undirected graph such that no 2 vertices in the subset have an edge between them in the graph?

name: Vertex Cover
description: Is there a subset of size at most k of vertices of an undirected graph such that every edge has an endpoint in the subset?
